faqs.question: When and where is LayerOne?
faqs.answer: LayerOne 2018 will be held at the Pasadena Hilton in Pasadena, CA on May 25-27, 2018. If you're not attending a training, the effective conference dates are May 26-27, 2018. For those of you flying in, the closest airport is the Hollywood/Burbank (Bob Hope) International Airport (BUR).
